Name: Something Tasty
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Adapted from a recipe created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Kolomiiets Dmytro Mikhailovich at Parovoz Speakeasy in Kiev, Ukraine.
Nutrition: One serving of Something Tasty contains 161 calories
